title: Where I can find that new highlights????
body: It sounds like a good function. Where I can find it. They said, that i can find it on the profile page. But there is nothing. Pls help me. Or maybe in my language it is not developed or translated. Thanks you for your reply.

replies.body:
I was wondering the same and decided to try something out.

I recorded a highlight (CTRL+V when watching a replay) and after restarting the client the "highlights" option appeared on my profile. No explanation like mentioned in the patchnotes tho. Funny how we are told we get  instructions when we didn't create a highlight yet and visit the page, but we can't visit the page without creating a highlight first :D 

It looks like this https://puu.sh/vaj7N/8b17d38ac9.png
I don't have any highlights currently so I'm not seeing anything.  Have you made any new highlights since the update?  It should show up in your profile.  Give it ago and let me know!
I did not created a highlight, but today highlights page appeared on my profile. I do not know what was that. I did not need to record a highlight.
